metadata.title: CVE-2020-13987 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Contiki through 3.0. An Out-of-Bounds Readvulnerability exists in the uIP TCP/IP Stack component when calculating thechecksums for IP packets in upper_layer_chksum in net/ipv4/uip.c.

criterions.comment: open-iscsi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
